content.text: For students currently living in RIT apartments, UC suites, and the RIT Inn who want to renew their contract for the space they are currently living in for the 2017–2018 academic year. November 01-04: Renewal Sign-Up November 07-13: Roommate Adds To get step-by-step instructions and information regarding how to renew your current RIT housing, go to our website at housing.rit.edu.

For students who are currently living in the residence halls, Global Village, and Greek Circle. This process is also for students who are currently in RIT apartments, UC suites, and the RIT Inn who did not renew their contract for the 2017–2018 academic year. Students who are living in non-RIT housing or on co-op or study abroad may also participate in this process. November 16–27: Complete 2017–2018 full academic year contract and request your roommate(s). November 29: Your appointment time will be sent to your RIT email account. Early December: Your appointment time to go online to select your housing will start and end sometime early December.

Sunday, October 23 7:00 p.m. – 8:00 p.m. Ingle Auditorium Wednesday, November 02 5:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. CSD Student Development Center 1300/1310 Tuesday, November 08 5:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. CSD Student Development Center 1300/1310 You can get additional information about Housing Selection on our website at housing.rit.edu. You will receive Room Selection sign-up instructions in October.
